title: Error message when trying to upload to Concepts Forum
body:
Been trying to upload a project I've been working on the the concepts and creations forum but every time I try it comes up error 500 with iblitzcranks {{champion:53}} 

was wondering if anyone else if having this issue and also wondering could it be because its too long perhaps? also was wondering how would I go about inserting images into it correctly with codes from image shack so links aren't required to be clicked?

replies.body: That's strange.  I haven't heard of any issues with posting on the boards, and your account seems to meet the requirements.  Do you have any extensions or blockers enabled?  To start off I suggest starting another browser, running Incognito, or clearing your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).  Let me know if that helps!

Just letting you know I've cracked it :D the issue was because I was trying to add a poll on weather people would like to see a Island Jinx skin or not so the errors not due to length or copy and paste its just something to do with the poll feature.

Hey just another update I tried to post the project again got a error message but decided to try posting something alot shorter in the same forum based on gifting skin shards and for some reason it worked for that so not sure why its not working for the project thinking it could be due to coppying and pasteing going to try again now without any copy and paste
tried to post it in the art, storys and sound forum aswell just now but no luck sadly
Thanks for the update and trying all of those steps.  I've attempted to sync your profile to try and force a refresh.  Log out and back in, and let me know if it works!

Still getting the error message with i blizzy :( thanks for trying though
Error: 500
Something’s gone hextechnically wrong.
Maintenance golems are working to exterminate the problem.
Hey thanks for the response just tried all of the things you suggested with chrome and fire fox but unfortunately same issue.
Tried again this morning still having the same isue
